Author: Liquid_Is_A_Paper
Text: Two words to explain why that's happening:  ğŸ§ â‹† ğŸ¦  ğŸ€  ğ’·ğŸµğ’¹ğ“ ğ’¹ğ“ğ“ˆğ“‚â€ğ“‡ğ“…ğ’½ğ’¾ğ’¶  ğŸ€  ğŸ¦ â‹† ğŸ§  &#x200B;  But for real, I think unfortunately you'd feel this way (or similar) regardless of your SO's size; if she's fat, your ED uses that to say "you don't want to look like that". If she's underweight, she's competition. If she's a normal/healthy weight but curvy, you have to be LESS curvy. If she's a normal/healthy weight but skinny, then once again, c o m p e t i t i o n.  EDs are a bitch and this will use WHATEVER size your partner is as a way to try and manipulate you. Being aware of this can help you combat it when these sorts of thoughts/feelings come up.
